name: Mastery Talisman: Searing Chains
description: After an opposing character takes Elemental Reaction DMG: Deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters. If the Elemental Reaction triggered is Pyro-Related Reactions, also gain 1 Omni Element. (up to 3 times per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opposing character takes Elemental Reaction DMG:</color> Deal 1 $[K5] to all opposing characters. If the Elemental Reaction triggered is $[K213], also gain 1 $[K411]. (up to 3 times per Round)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opposing character takes Elemental Reaction DMG:</color> Deal 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters. If the Elemental Reaction triggered is <color=#FF9999FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro-Related Reactions</color>, also gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>. (up to 3 times per Round)
